fields.name: AdditionalCapabilities
fields.description: Specifies additional capabilities enabled or disabled on the Virtual Machines in the Virtual Machine Scale Set. For instance: whether the Virtual Machines have the capability to support attaching managed data disks with UltraSSD_LRS storage account type.

fields.name: DoNotRunExtensionsOnOverprovisionedVMs
fields.description: When Overprovision is enabled, extensions are launched only on the requested number of VMs which are finally kept. This property will hence ensure that the extensions do not run on the extra overprovisioned VMs.

fields.name: Overprovision
fields.description: Specifies whether the Virtual Machine Scale Set should be overprovisioned.

fields.name: ProximityPlacementGroup
fields.description:
Specifies information about the proximity placement group that the virtual machine scale set should be assigned to.

Minimum api-version: 2018-04-01.

fields.name: ScaleInPolicy
fields.description: Specifies the policies applied when scaling in Virtual Machines in the Virtual Machine Scale Set.

fields.name: SinglePlacementGroup
fields.description: When true this limits the scale set to a single placement group, of max size 100 virtual machines. NOTE: If singlePlacementGroup is true, it may be modified to false. However, if singlePlacementGroup is false, it may not be modified to true.
